subject: Job Interview Invitation
body: Dear Sneha, We are pleased to invite you for an interview on 22nd July at 2 PM. Please confirm your availability.

subject: Invoice Due Reminder
body: Hi, This is a reminder that your invoice #12345 is overdue and must be paid by July 25th to avoid service interruption.

subject: Welcome to Newsletter
